seed_source_id.description: The ID of the seed source

grower_id.description: The ID of the grower responsible for this sub-succession

created_at.description: Date when the sub-succession was created

merged_into.description: The ID of the sub-succession this one was merged into

parent_sub_succession.description: The ID of the parent sub-succession

expected_outcome.description: Expected outcome or goal for this sub-succession

tree_id.description: The ID of a tree associated with this sub-succession
